nodes.text: The Kingdom of Jaminere was a state located within the Tion Cluster in the Pre-Republic era. It once allied with the Kingdoms of Cadinth and Barseg, creating the Three Allied Kingdoms. Pirate King Xer VIII waged a campaign against the kingdoms between 25,150 BBY and 25,130 BBY, defeating the Kingdom of Jaminere at the Battle of Jaminere. The Three Allied Kingdoms worlds were conquered and integrated in Xer's Empire.
